channel.title: [317 Delta]HELP! Attack/damage command.[317 Delta]
channel.description: OK, i want a command that will cause me to damage playes around me. Like, ::bomb, and the other players get damaged. how would this work?

item.title: [317 Delta]HELP! Attack/damage command.[317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

xxckwxx:

Its not rather idotic, I am asking it to “learn” way things work. Why the hell are you going to ask a idiotic question like that? Btw, talking and saying this has just made you look like a fool. Please don’t post unless you think you can help. This stupid commenting post has lost respect for you from me, and i bet other people who read this. So… use that brain of yours befor you post, OK?

It kind of is idiotic. We aren’t going to spoonfeed something that really has no use. If you want to do it, figure it out.

item.title: [317 Delta]HELP! Attack/damage command.[317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

Ok, say like its kinda like a vengance attack. I put in ::bomb and it make a random hit to a set of scale 10-80 damage. I was planning on putting a timmer, GFX, and other commands. Do you understand now. It is more or less a thing of learning not to have. I just was wondering how this would work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2009, 08:12:29 pm[/size][hr][quote=“trytohaxme, post:2, topic:302528”]Why the hell would you want a idiotic command like that?[/quote]
Its not rather idotic, I am asking it to “learn” way things work. Why the hell are you going to ask a idiotic question like that? Btw, talking and saying this has just made you look like a fool. Please don’t post unless you think you can help. This stupid commenting post has lost respect for you from me, and i bet other people who read this. So… use that brain of yours befor you post, OK?
